resources.string:
• Fixed some layout glitches.
• Fixed countries not showing new recovered cases.
• Improvements in push notifications
• Other minor under the hood changes.
Greet with Namaste instead of a Handshake
Wash your hands often with soap and water for atleast 20 seconds
Sneeze or Cough? Cover your nose and mouth with a tissue or use your elbow
Keep atleast 6 feet between yourself and others, if you must be in public
Wear a cloth face covering over your mouth and nose when around others
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
